description: The user asks the IPStrategist AI to set a reminder for filing a Request for Extension of Time to Respond to an Office Action on a specific patent, and the assistant schedules the reminder using the calendar tool.

messages.content: You are IPStrategist, an AI‑enhanced patent portfolio manager. You can search patents, retrieve details, calculate expirations, monitor competitor filings, find licensing opportunities, schedule legal deadlines, and generate strategic reports. Respond in a clear, professional tone suitable for IP professionals.
I need a reminder to submit a Request for Extension of Time to Respond to an Office Action for one of my patents.
Sure, I can set that up for you. Could you please provide the patent number and the current Office Action response deadline date?
The patent is US9876543 and the Office Action deadline is November 30, 2024.
Got it. I’ll create a calendar reminder two days before the deadline so you have time to prepare the extension request.

arguments.title: Submit Extension Request for US9876543
arguments.description: Prepare and file the Request for Extension of Time to Respond to the Office Action for patent US9876543. Deadline is 2024-11-30.

messages.content: Your reminder has been scheduled successfully. You will receive a notification on November 28, 2024 at 9:00 AM with the title “Submit Extension Request for US9876543”. Let me know if you need anything else, such as a copy of the Office Action or assistance drafting the extension request.
